name: imports-and-stuff
description: A demo of the natively supported import syntax

scripts.build: mkdir -p build/src && babel src -d build/src && mkdir -p build/libs && babel libs -d build/libs && cp index_require.html build/index.html && cp node_modules/babel-polyfill/dist/polyfill.min.js build/libs/polyfill.min.js && cp node_modules/requirejs/require.js build/libs/require.js

author: Sebastian Gfeller
